scripts.prepare: [ "$NODE_ENV" = "development" ] && husky install || echo 'Skipping husky setup in production'
scripts.dev:server: cd server && NODE_OPTIONS='--no-deprecation --disable-warning=ExperimentalWarning' npm run dev
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && NODE_OPTIONS='--no-deprecation --disable-warning=ExperimentalWarning' npm run dev"
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:all
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.test:e2e: sh -c 'cleanup() { kill -9 $(lsof -t -i:3000,3001) 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -f nodemon || true; pkill -f "npm run dev" || true; }; trap cleanup EXIT INT TERM; cleanup; npm run dev & wait-on http://127.0.0.1:3001/api/health http://127.0.0.1:3000 && ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=1 NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --disable-warning=ExperimentalWarning" cypress run'
scripts.test:e2e:open: sh -c 'cleanup() { kill -9 $(lsof -t -i:3000,3001) 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -f nodemon || true; pkill -f "npm run dev" || true; }; trap cleanup EXIT INT TERM; cleanup; npm run dev & wait-on http://127.0.0.1:3001/api/health http://127.0.0.1:3000 && ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=1 NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --disable-warning=ExperimentalWarning" cypress open'
scripts.test:local-ci: trap 'docker ps -q | xargs -r docker stop; docker ps -aq | xargs -r docker rm' EXIT; act -j test --container-architecture linux/amd64
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm i && cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.update:all: npm update && cd client && npm update && cd ../server && npm update
scripts.start: npm run build:client && NODE_ENV=production concurrently "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run start"
